about_the_game:
Introduction

Escape Alliance is a fast paced maze runner where you will advance through maps of dangerous enemies, obstacles and projectiles while making sure to not touch the edges of the map. Only one hit will take you out!

Singleplayer/Multiplayer

It's perfectly fine to play the game alone, but if you play with other players, the first player will unlock the next checkpoint for everyone else, making it a collaborative experience.

Some maps will only be available in multiplayer as it will have puzzles requiring multiple players to solve.

The game supports up to 12 players.

Maps

The game will introduce different landscapes and different maps, but as of now only one map and a snow biome has been developed.

Release date

The release date will most likely be somewhere in early/late summer of 2025.

I'am a solo developer that got inspired by escape type of games in my early childhood and couldn't find any newer games that implemented the same gameplay ideas. This is a passion project that will be followed up on for a long time to come. Don't expect a super fast development process, but small updates in a steady pace. Thank you for your interest in the game.

Come and join the Escape Alliance!

short_description: An addictive escape game in a low poly style. You will face waves of enemies and lots of obstacles that will try to stop you from reaching the the end. As you progress the difficulty increases. Choose between several maps with different terrain and obstacles. Play alone or with up to 12 friends.
